name: Dobermon
description: Dobermon is a Dark Animal Digimon. It is a Hunter Digimon that was originally a Virus Digimon, but was converted to a Vaccine by a mutation. Similar to Snimon , despite being called a Vaccine, it is a ferocious Digimon that exists solely for hunting Virus Digimon, and it can't be controlled by an ordinary Tamer .
